applicationDirectorWebImport.//_optional: For future something like the following optional fields could be introduced

headerBulletPoints.msg: A blueprint is a visual model for deployment topology. This page has an import utility that allows you to automatically render the selected application blueprint into vCloud Automation Center - Application Services
Your vCloud Automation Center - Application Services instance needs to be network accessible for the import utility to work
You need to have Catalog Admin and Application Architect roles to use import the blueprint into your instance of vCloud Automation Center - Application Services
If you do not have an instance of vCloud Automation Center - Application Services, contact us at app-mgmt-partner-support@vmware.com
